caption.p: ( a) Mg K-edge XANES spectra of B(OMgCl) 3-AlCl 3 in triglyme (black) and B(OMgCl) 3-AlCl 3 in triglyme-THF (red) and ( b) Fourier transform of the EXAFS function of the former. ( c) Al K-edge XANES spectra of B(OMgCl) 3-AlCl 3 in triglyme (black), B(OMgCl) 3-AlCl 3 in triglyme-THF (red), AlCl 3 in triglyme (blue), and AlCl 3 in triglyme-THF (pink).
